author: Aaron Phillips
comment: Love the simplistic nature of the app. LOVE the fee-free nature of Simple, but suspect that will disappear when the bank grows. For now I'm loving you, Simple. I'm happy with you. I do wish there was a way to speed up delays with newly opened accounts. Maybe its a law? But its fine.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, Aaron! Support Messages are experiencing unexpected delays due to newly implemented software which will (ironically) make Support much more efficient. For urgent matters, always feel free to call us at (888) 248-0632. We'd love to clarify what timelines are affected with new accounts! Give us a call to do so. ^TK

author: Sam
comment: What's the point in having customer service number if nobody ever answers??? I've called 4 times a day the past 3 days during your phone lines open hours and not a single person answers and I'll let the phone ring for 15 mins. Invest in better customer service

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content:
Hi Sam,
Thanks for your feedback. Phone lines have been quite busy recently, with holds anywhere from 5-15 minutes earlier in the day. Typically we see a lull around 1:30pm PT and as of right now, at 9:20am PT, there actually isn't any hold times. Give us a call! ^TK

author: Tania Gonzalez Lopez
comment: Fixed! Thank you! Awesome app as always, simple to use (hah) and really straight forward!

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Thanks for letting us know, Tania! We've released another update—can you update your app and see if that fixes this? ^TK

author: Dave Cobb
comment: New client, submitted a few support inquiries via the mobile app and 4 days later have not yet had a response.

author: Lynda Francis
comment: Contact me i emailed several times and no one answered i want to know what you did with my 3000 dollars

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: We might have to close an account if it doesn't meet certain requirements. Please send a support message for further information! ^TK

author: Kevin Mangual
comment: Best bank I ever used just wish y'all would come out with a black card 😍

author: Aimee Edwards
comment: Customer service is always A+. Nice features with the account including deactivating it temporarily  if it's misplaced and reactivating it once it's been found.

author: Aspen Kalina
comment: Could use more features

author: Jacob M
comment: Can't get support to answer me with my issues.  Account hasn't been linked, test deposits haven't made it, submitted two chats and one email with no response from support.  This app isn't very "simple".  I'd love to this app to change my mind before I delete it.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Jacob! Thanks for your feedback—right now support messages are experiencing delays due to newly implemented software which will actually improve Support efficiency. While we work out the kinks, for any time-sensitive matters, please give us a call at (888) 248-0632! ^TK

author: Darcy Barnes
comment: I've been trying out quite a few banks. I keep a traditional bank like Chase or USAA so I can have checks and ATM deposits but I also like online banks because they don't charge overdraft or ATM fees, but unfortunately Simple charges you to withdraw. I don't have any banks near me I can withdraw for free. Also, sometimes it seems my transactions aren't loaded in real time. I frequently check my account but I can check it after buying $30 worth of gas and it won't show as a pending charge for a a day or two which isn't bad when I remember but if I've been getting a little swipe happy or forget then I can easily spend too much because the transactions aren't updating and showing that I have more money than I actually do. With USAA & Chase I get paid a day early (thursday), but with simple I don't get paid until Friday, not a huge deal but it's amazing how you get used to that difference & I do wish they did the same. Overall, ours probably one of the better online banks. I like the look of their app and debit card, but if they updated the few things I mentioned then I think I would keep them as my main bank instead of a place to stash a few extra bucks.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! We actually don't charge any fees—it sounds like you're visiting ATMs outside of our fee-free network. Gas stations often place large holds for pump purchases—to avoid the hold, the transaction appears after it's settled. You can avoid it by purchasing gas inside instead! We'd love to clarify this & more—give us a call!^TK

author: Ashley Scholes
comment: My previous issues have resolved, but I still can't get my push notifications to happen consistently, and that's a huge annoyance for me.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Glad to hear that, Ashley! Please give Support a call at (888) 248-0632 so we can troubleshoot your ability to receive push notifications. ^TK

author: Jacob Jackson
comment: I love the service and the app. The only downside is that it keeps losing the sign in information every few months and forces me to log back in, once I can figure out my credentials.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Jacob! Thanks for the feedback. This is actually due to our security features for your account. Every few months, you'll need to re-enter a two-factor authentication code to make sure it's you using your app and this will include having to log in with your full login credentials. ^TK

author: Michael Hill
comment: Awesome app! This is the most complete banking app I've found so far. Checks are submitted and the funds acquired in a couple of days max.   When I work for Lyft, I get my money in minutes when I get paid.

author: Thomas Downey
comment: Three days to look over, had to resumbit it and it's been another three days now and no word back. Hmmm, maybe I'll stick to my pre paid card. After 4th business day submit into twice, same conclusion? Mkay, just signed up with chime instead took less than 30 seconds. Smdh

author: Blake Bartlett
comment: It asks for your social..unsafe

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Blake! As we provide actual bank accounts, requiring a SSN is actually pretty standard as identity theft prevention. You can rest assured knowing that security is our top priority and we keep our customers' information safe and secure. You can see more information here: https://www.simple.com/policies/privacy-practices ^TK

author: Matthew Burnard
comment: Great app, love the new auto spend from goal feature!

author: Andrew Merritt
comment: I loved this app. Its the best banking app i have ever used. Ever since the latest update I cannot use the app. It crashes immeditately. I have resinstalled several times. Nothing is working.  PLEASE FIX!!!   Will be happy to change this to a 5 star if you can get this working again.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Andrew! We've recently released a new update. Could you make sure to update your app and give us a call at (888) 248-0632 if you're still experiencing the crashes? ^TK

author: Michelle Meehan
comment: 5 days to process a check? I could have had my money sooner at any other institution. I read their check hold policy over and over and couldn't find anything in their policy to justify this. My check was under $5000 and I've been with this bank longer than 90 days.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content:
Hey Michelle, 
In some instances, for security reasons, checks have to be held in order to ensure that the funds will be available for deposit. We know it's not convenient and we appreciate your feedback! Feel free to reach out to Support about this for the possibility of further information. ^TK

author: Roxanne Turner
comment: Worked perfectly but since the last uodate, not only can I not access it AT ALL, but I am constantly getting the notification that "Simple has stopped" while using my phone for other things. So it's annoying me even when I'm not trying to use it. Need to fix this ASAP.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Roxanne! Thanks for reporting. We've released another update recently—can you update your app and let us know if you're still running into this? ^TK

author: Cheryl Davis
comment: Won't give me my $20 referral bonus and the app keeps crashing since the update.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Cheryl! So sorry to hear about the trouble. We'd love to look into this for you—could you give us a call so we can look into it? ^TK

author: Michael Haltner
comment: Latest version crashes on startup.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Thanks for the report, Michael! We've released another update recently—can you update your app and let us know if you still experience the trouble? ^TK

author: Kohlton Timmons
comment: Recently switched back to Simple from Primetrust. After ordering my new card, customer service did not tell me that my account was dormant from inactivity. Days ago I opted direct deposit on here from my tax return but my card won't even let me spend a dime!! This is insane!!

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Kohlton, sorry to hear about the poor experience. When an account is inactive for over a year, it is possible that our partner bank had automatically listed it as being dormant. We're looking into making this process more user-friendly but for now, you'll want to report this to Support so we can have it fixed up within a day or so! ^TK

author: Sarah Winright
comment: NOT SIMPLE!!! They won't really give you the "Bonus" when you use the link and your card. Also, they have deleted my review of them. I have had so many issues with them and I have only had this card about 2 weeks. I would not recommend as they are not transferring my money (from PayPal) like it should be and they are obviously going through deleting bad reviews. They don't want to do what they should be however they find time to delete this!

author: Sabrina Pannkuk
comment: I put my ssn in and my birthday and they could verify me. So my account wasn't approved. This is stupid.

author: todd reagan
comment: Waste of data. No customer service at all. I'd rather have a big pickle jar.

author: Tyler DeGraaf
comment: Consistently won't let me log in. Says incorrect username and password. Log in using browser - works fine. Happens all the time. Tired of changing password

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content:
Hey Tyler,
It sounds like the IP address on that device is being blocked by our security. Resetting your passphrase from your device should do the trick, but please reach out to Support to look into this if it keeps happening! ^TK

author: Dustin H
comment: Still doesn't have recurring goals. Want to set aside money for your mortgage every month? You have to manually put that goal in every month. People have been asking for it for years now. Uninstalled again.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Dustin, we totally hear ya. We've had some pretty big changes over the past couple of years, focusing on our move to our new banking platform with BBVA Compass. Now that we've completed that process, we're focusing on new features like recurring Goals. Look out for updates soon! ^TK

author: Nix
comment: Been able to save up easily, the same to spend feature letting me know of what I do have available. Support and app check depositing are both wicked quicker than all my local banks. Simple takes a buisness day, compared to 4-12 days...

author: Axel Rhal
comment: Comment/ feature request/ bug report. My support messages are retaining their 'unread' status. There is no 'mark as read' feature and opening the message and scrolling through won't fix it. Possible bug, definitely beneficial feature. Thanks for the cool app, 5 stars otherwise.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Axel! I've heard a couple of reports about this, too. I see that you were running on an older version of the app when you wrote in—could you update to the most recent version and see if that fixes up the issue? ^TK

author: Travis
comment: Please add the option to put cash onto the card at Stores such as Wal-Mart. It's not simple at all when a person doesn't have a bank account to do any transfers and if they did it would take to Long money loading and money transfers need to be quick and painless. Thank you for your response I really hope it will be out soon this feature and many others. I want to get away from using my PayPal card which charges a fee every month-  update is this feature available yet?

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Travis! Keep in mind that your account is an actual bank account—not a prepaid card like Green Dot cards which you would load cash onto. We are looking into secure options for cash depositing, but we don't yet have an ETA. Thank you for your feedback! ^TK

author: Ruben Pereida Jr
comment: like the idea, but I cant log in! It says to check back later...yeah not using this app.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hmm... that's certainly pretty odd. Could you try giving us a call at (888) 248-0632 so we can help troubleshoot? ^TK

author: sandie
comment: E asy banking and live customer service no machines
I've been a Simple customer since 2013. I love it. Consistently good customer service and support.

author: Chris Bobbett
comment: Simple is fantastic with a best in class experience and service.
Great Customer Service Awesome

author: Shekelia Lasha
comment: I love this bank and this app. I've been with Simple for almost 6 months and they are awesome. This app is very SIMPLE. NO MORE WAITING FOR PENDING CHARGES! It also offers transaction notifications which is very useful. It gives you an option to temporarily block the card in case of fraud. ONLY CON if you want to contact customer service it's best to just call them you can message them on the app but it will take DAYS for them to respond and IF on the weekend just wait until Monday!

author: Todd Johnson
comment: HORRIBLE. 1) Would not let me sign in, because of repeatedly asking for SHORT CODES. 2) When I finally could log in, would not process my transfer into the acct, to settle negative balance. --supposed to be SIMPLE.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Hey Todd, sorry to hear about the troubles. Our two-factor authentication uses short code SMS text messaging—if you have trouble receiving these codes, our Support Team can help out by calling (888) 248-0632. Please give us a call so we can help with your transfer if needed! ^TK

comment: I was excited to try this bank out. It had so many positive attributes. Unfortunately, they won't allow me to open an account. It stated I may not be a US citizen or under 18. Well, I'm 31 and no question that I was born in the US... not sure why they decided to deny  me an account but it seems to be a broken process.

reply.author: Simple Finance Technology Corp.
reply.content: Sorry to hear about the experience! There are several factors that go into opening accounts, including banking history. Give us a call at (888) 248-0632 to see if we can provide any additional information, but keep in mind that for security reasons, we may not have any additional details to share. ^TK

author: Gabe Robles
comment: For the first time in my life I'm paying up debts and saving money and I owe a lot of the credit to Simple. It allows you to have instant eyes on your cash and know exactly how much you can spend without throwing off your budget.

author: Terence Campolieti
comment: Horrible service. They're not even close to being ready to be a financial institution. Theyre never available, they deny transactions when I have money. Done! I'm going to Wells Fargo. I'll pay the fees but get better service.
